author: rich
msg: Fix for http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-873 : HTTP session gets created after the pageflow application invalidates it (logout) and the response is committed, resulting in IllegalStateException
The fix is based on a contribution from Abdessattar Sassi.
